flight.priceDesc1: HAVE MORE PRICING OPTIONS for your trip.
flight.priceDesc2: Please note that some flights on your itinerary only have carry-on baggage fares. Please check before booking.
flight.spanFlight5: Passenger information must match your passport or photo ID
flight.name: Middle Name and First Name

flight.paymentDesc3: By clicking this submit booking button, I agree to the

price.bookingCondition3: Please check the visa/transit requirements before you plan your trip.
price.bookingCondition5: If the passenger fails to start the next journey, the entire booking (PNR) will be automatically cancelled by the airline. Booking. cannot control or provide alternative bookings in this case. Cancellation penalties will apply as per the airline's regulations.
price.bookingCondition7: Passengers travelling on a tourist/visitor visa require a confirmed return ticket.
price.bookingCondition8: Bring proof of accommodation and sufficient funds in the destination country.
price.bookingCondition9: Comply with the airline's stimulus regulations airline's baggage size, otherwise you will be charged extra or denied boarding.
price.bookingCondition11: Passport valid for at least 6 months from the date of departure.
price.bookingCondition12: Present a hard copy of your foreign visa at the immigration counter.
price.bookingCondition13: Booking. is not responsible for visa information. Check details before booking.
price.bookingCondition15: Travelers are responsible for ensuring they meet entry/transit requirements. Check travel regulations before booking and starting their journey.
